DOC.brief_summary: A study to assess the safety of an investigational meningitis vaccine in toddlers and their immune response to it.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety & Immunogenicity of rLP2086 Vaccine in Healthy Toddlers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Aged 18 to 36months Healthy male or female subjects Exclusion Criteria Prior vaccination with a serogroup B meningococcal vaccine Prior history of any invasive meningococcal disease
